attributes.action: Introduce emergency service parking at the entrance of all major supermarkets.
attributes.additional_details:
Check out the video of the ambulance recieving a ticket here. 

https://youtu.be/BGfR_xta51A
attributes.background: This week an ambulance was parked on double yellow lines at a Tesco store while the paramedics went in to get water on their ‘break’ whilst still on call. The ambulance received a parking ticket because it wasn’t parked in a bay within the car park.

rejection.details:
This would be a decision for supermarkets to make, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/225954
